template.template: Template Module Windows services by Zabbix agent active
template.name: Template Module Windows services by Zabbix agent active
template.description:
Template Services OS Windows
Template tooling version used: 0.34

discovery_rule.name: Windows services discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of Windows services of different types as defined in template's macros.

trigger_prototype.expression: min(/Template Module Windows services by Zabbix agent active/service.info["{#SERVICE.NAME}",state],#3)<>0
trigger_prototype.name: "{#SERVICE.NAME}" ({#SERVICE.DISPLAYNAME}) is not running (startup type {#SERVICE.STARTUPNAME})
trigger_prototype.description: The service has a state other than "Running" for the last three times.

macro.description: This macro is used in Service discovery. Can be overridden on the host or linked template level.

macro.value: ^RemoteRegistry|MMCSS|gupdate|SysmonLog|clr_optimization_v.+|clr_optimization_v.+|sppsvc|gpsvc|Pml Driver HPZ12|Net Driver HPZ12|MapsBroker|IntelAudioService|Intel\(R\) TPM Provisioning Service|dbupdate|DoSvc$
macro.description: This macro is used in Service discovery. Can be overridden on the host or linked template level.
This macro is used in Service discovery. Can be overridden on the host or linked template level.
This macro is used in Service discovery. Can be overridden on the host or linked template level.

template.name: Template Windows Server Active - Randon
template.description: Template para monitoramento de Windows Server.

template.name: Template Module ICMP Ping Randon - No Triggers

trigger.name: O agent esta indisponivel por [ {$TIME_AGENT} ] minutos

item.name: Bytes de gravação de arquivo por segundo
Average disk read queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Read Queue Length

item.name: Média da fila de gravação em disco
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Write Queue Length

item.name: Status do serviço SIEM Rapid7 Insight Agent

trigger.name: Agente Rapid 7 Insight Agent está parado
trigger.event_name: Agente Rapid 7 Insight Agent está parado

trigger.name: Utilização de CPU nos últimos {$TIME_CPU} é {ITEM.VALUE}
Falta de memória livre no servidor {HOST.NAME}
Utilização de Memória nos últimos {$TIME_MEMORY} é {ITEM.VALUE}

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger_prototype.expression: max(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree],{$FS_TIME})<={$FS_AVERAGE_0: "{#FSNAME}"} and avg(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free],30m)<={$FS.BYTE.AVERAGE: "{#FSNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.name: O espaço livre em disco é baixo (menos de {$FS_AVERAGE_0: "{#FSNAME}"}% espaço livre abaixo de 30GB) na partição: {#FSNAME}

dependency.name: O espaço livre em disco é baixo (menos de {$FS_HIGH_0: "{#FSNAME}"}% espaço livre abaixo de 20GB) na partição: {#FSNAME}
dependency.expression: max(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree],{$FS_TIME})<={$FS_HIGH_0: "{#FSNAME}"} and avg(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free],10m)<={$FS.BYTE.HIGH: "{#FSNAME}"}

dependency.name: O espaço livre em disco é crítico (menos de {$FS_DISASTER_0: "{#FSNAME}"}% espaço livre abaixo de 10GB) na partição: {#FSNAME}
dependency.expression: last(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree])<={$FS_DISASTER_0: "{#FSNAME}"} and last(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free])<={$FS.BYTE.DISASTER: "{#FSNAME}"}

trigger_prototype.expression: max(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree],{$FS_TIME})<={$FS_HIGH_0: "{#FSNAME}"} and avg(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free],10m)<={$FS.BYTE.HIGH: "{#FSNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.name: O espaço livre em disco é baixo (menos de {$FS_HIGH_0: "{#FSNAME}"}% espaço livre abaixo de 20GB) na partição: {#FSNAME}

dependency.name: O espaço livre em disco é crítico (menos de {$FS_DISASTER_0: "{#FSNAME}"}% espaço livre abaixo de 10GB) na partição: {#FSNAME}
dependency.expression: last(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree])<={$FS_DISASTER_0: "{#FSNAME}"} and last(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free])<={$FS.BYTE.DISASTER: "{#FSNAME}"}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree])<={$FS_DISASTER_0: "{#FSNAME}"} and last(/Template Windows Server Active - Randon/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free])<={$FS.BYTE.DISASTER: "{#FSNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.name: O espaço livre em disco é crítico (menos de {$FS_DISASTER_0: "{#FSNAME}"}% espaço livre abaixo de 10GB) na partição: {#FSNAME}
